title: Coldwell Banker JAX Agents → Brevo CSV

startUrl.title: Directory start URL
startUrl.description: Coldwell Banker city directory URL (first page).

perDomainDelayMs.title: Delay per domain (ms)
perDomainDelayMs.description: Politeness delay before requests to the same domain.

followOffsiteMax.title: Max offsite links per profile
followOffsiteMax.description: How many website/social links to open per agent to hunt emails.

preferDomain.title: Prefer email domain (optional)
preferDomain.description: If multiple emails found, prefer this domain (e.g., @cbvfl.com).
